pages.text: To start falconry with the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagle$(/l), you will need to craft the Falconry Glove.$(br2)When held either in the main or off-hand, this glove can be used to pick up eagles and hold them in hand.$(br2)To launch and eagle from the hand, simply punch.
If launched while staring at a mob, the eagle will fly to this mob, attack, and, if it survives, return to the hand. If no mob is selected the eagle will simply jump off the glove.
